mikbrt wrote:
> I was wondering if anyone was getting OutOfMemoryErrors thrown when
> checkpointing. On my system (8GB memory, 1GB allocated to the heap) I
> have checkpointing running every twenty four hours and it crashed
> after only a few days. 

It would be useful to see the lines of heritrix_out.log and 
progress_statistics.log before the point where the error occurred.
How large is this crawl?  Are you using BloomUriUniqFilter?

> The checkpointing as far as I know is only
> rolling over the logs, not writing the (jdb?) files. 

What is your checkpoint-copy-bdbje-logs parameter (near the end of 
order.xml) set to?  If it is set to true, relevant jdb files are copied 
to the checkpoint directory.  If it is set to false, section 9.4.1 of 
the user manual 
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual.html#checkpoint explains 
what you have.

Mike
